description: MCP client library and bridge for Neemee personal knowledge management system

environmentVariables.name: NEEMEE_API_KEY
environmentVariables.description: API key for authenticating with Neemee API (required)

environmentVariables.name: NEEMEE_API_BASE_URL
environmentVariables.description: Base URL for Neemee MCP server (optional, defaults to https://neemee.app/mcp)
